events.message: I ordered a laptop two weeks ago and my shipment still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in several days either.
The issue was identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's description of late shipment and tracking concerns.
The case has been assigned to a customer support representative specializing in shipping issues.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I understand that your order hasn't arrived yet. I'm here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking information you have, so I can check the shipment status for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking number is TRK987654321. The last update was five days ago, and nothing new since then.

I checked with the shipping carrier and it seems your package is delayed due to weather conditions. We expect delivery within the next three days and can offer a shipping discount for the inconvenience.
Thanks for the update and the discount offer. I appreciate the help and will wait a few more days for the delivery.
Your package has now been delivered according to our records. Please confirm receipt so we can close your case.
Just following up to make sure everything with your recent order delivery is satisfactory. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since we have not heard back and your package was delivered, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and please contact us anytime.
